sentences.sContent: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.sCn: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

sentences.sContent: Always check the details carefully before you sign any written agreement.
sentences.sCn: 签署任何书面协议之前都要仔细核对细节。

sentences.sContent: I can see you any time on Monday.
sentences.sCn: 星期一我随时都能见你。

sentences.sContent: If I can help in any way, let me know.
sentences.sCn: 要是我能帮上忙的话，就告诉我一声。

sentences.sContent: This excuse was as good as any other .
sentences.sCn: 这个借口和其他借口如出一辙。

trans.tranOther: used to refer to a person or thing of a particular type when what you are saying is true of all people or things of that type
